document_data.mainbody:
liinki was a mad derro savant and a member of the Gray Ghosts thieves guild in Gracklstugh in the late 15 century DR.
Pliinki believed that the Gray Ghosts obelisk was hidden in its location by Diirinka herself and that rebuilding it would grant "unimaginable power" that she could use to conquer the city.
She was tasked by the guilds leaders with the mission of rebuilding the obelisk, assisted by a spectator. Circa 1486 DR, she was waiting for the delivery of a fragment from Droki.
